name: TwineHomemediaControl
0:
”Alexa, ask access twine play magic”
”volume down”
”device stop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: access twine
des:
Twine Home Media Control allows to control and play media contents stored on your home Digital Media Server. With straightforward voice commands all stored home media contents can be controlled.
In order to use Twine Home Media Control all you need is a subscription from our Twine Home gateway partners and a USB with stored media contents which can be plugged into gateway device. Once you take the subscription from our Twine gateway partners they will provide you login details which will be your email and password which is generated for you. These details can be used for account linking purpose. Once account linking is done you can enjoy your favorite music just asking Alexa to play.

Try saying
volume up
volume down
device stop
device pause
device start
